trans-unit.source: Indicates the format in which type descriptions are laid out in the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 指示中的類型描述的配置序列化資料流中的格式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that types can be given to all object members and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> object members.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以提供給所有的物件成員的型別和<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref>物件成員。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that types can be stated only for arrays of objects, object members of type <xref:System.Object>, and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> non-primitive value types.
trans-unit.target: 表示只對陣列的物件，物件類型的成員，可以用說明類型<xref:System.Object>，和<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref>非基本數值類型。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that strings can be given in the XSD format rather than SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以提供在 XSD 格式，而非 SOAP 的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `XsdString` and `TypesWhenNeeded` settings are meant for high performance serialization between services built on the same version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: `XsdString`和`TypesWhenNeeded`設定是為了建置的相同版本的服務之間的高效能序列化[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: These two values do not support VTS (Version Tolerant Serialization) because they intentionally omit type information that VTS uses to skip or add optional fields and properties.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個值不支援 VTS （版本相容序列化），因為它們會刻意省略 VTS 用來略過，或是將選擇性的欄位和屬性的型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: You should not use the `XsdString` or `TypesWhenNeeded` type formats when serializing and deserializing types on a computer running a different version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] than the computer on which the type was serialized.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用`XsdString`或`TypesWhenNeeded`輸入格式序列化和還原序列化型別執行不同版本的電腦上時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]比電腦已序列化的型別。

trans-unit.source: Serializing and deserializing on computers running different versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] causes the formatter to skip serialization of type information, thus making it impossible for the deserializer to skip optional fields if they are not present in certain types that may exist in the other version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 序列化和還原序列化執行不同版本的電腦上[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]導致略過的型別資訊，因而導致還原序列化程式，以略過選擇性欄位，如果它們不會出現在其他版本中可能存在的某些類型的序列化格式子[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you must use `XsdString` or `TypesWhenNeeded` in such a scenario, you must provide custom serialization for types that have changed from one version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to the other.
trans-unit.target: 如果您必須使用`XsdString`或`TypesWhenNeeded`在此案例中，您必須提供自訂序列化類型已變更從一個版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]之間。
